mainText:
I am not sure where this email will go, but here it goes...

We have truly lost a visionary person that this world will never forget.
His passion for life, inspiration, and true inspiration is what makes a
unique leader.  I truly want to thank Steve for creating products that
people will be using for generations to come.  More importantly, for helping
my child communicate more effectively to us through the iPad.


Rest in peace and ensure that our prayers are with his family.
author: Brian
